channel.title: Items keep going into weapon slot
channel.description:
Hay guys .
I downloaded Dogs Client v6 or sth , and I'm using as my client for all players .
The new added items in the client , like Godswords , 3rd Age Armour , Skillcape .ALL , yes ALL . Goes into the weapon slot .
Anyone knows how to edit this ? Like , make the Skillcape go into the cape equip , Helmet into the head equip ?

item.title: Items keep going into weapon slot
item.dc:creator: @viruz_3 viruz 3
item.description:
@viruz_3 wrote:

Update your Item.java file…

Where it says public static int capes[] = {numbershere} add the skillcape id into that spot.

Read full topic
item.source: Items keep going into weapon slot
